org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.base.NativeInstanceBase

type
class
subclasses
org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.as3.NativeInstance
This class is used to manipulate a native class instance, call its methods, retrieve attributes values etc. It is necessary to use this "proxy" since the native methods and attributes may need processing before being used in haXe. And also haXe values may need processing before being passed to the native class. For example, in php, when we have a reference to a class, we can call its methods directly, but the hashes and haxe array need to be converted into associative arrays and native arrays, see http://haxe.org/api/php/lib?lang=fr for details about this.

Constructor

new(nativeInstanceClassName : String)
parameters
nativeInstanceClassName the name of the native class to wrap in this NativeInstance
Instantiate the native class with the provided class name. Instantiation is specific to each runtime and so it is done in inheriting classes

Instance Methods

callMethod(methodName : String, args : Array<Dynamic>) : Dynamic

parameters
methodName the name of the method to call
args the arguments of the called methods
returns
null or the return value of the method call
Call a method on the native class and may return the method return value

getField(fieldName : String) : Dynamic

parameters
fieldName the name of the field to return
returns
the field's value
Returns the value of a field of the object

getReferenceToNativeClassInstance() : Dynamic

Returns the reference to the native class instance

isFunction(functionName : String) : Bool

parameters
functionName the name of the tested function
returns
true if function, false if not or non-existent
Return wether the provided function name references a function. note : this method proxies the isFunction Reflection API method to allow runtime specific override, as its implementation vary.

setField(fieldName : String, fieldValue : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
fieldName the name of the field to set
fieldValue the value to set on the field
Set the value of a field on the native class instance warning : in as3, throws an error if the field doesn't exist, in js, create the field
